entry.title: WIND WARNING , Tofino
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:07 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tofino Airport 01:00 AM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023

Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: WNW 36 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
